name: Going Down Swinging
text: [x]Give your hero +2 Attack and Immune this turn, then attack each enemy minion.

name: Thori'belore
text: [x]Rush. Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Cast a Fire spell to revive Thori'belore!

name: Inquisitive Creation
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. (Improved by each spell school you've cast this game!)

name: Canary
text: Battlecry: Return an enemy minion to its owner's hand.

name: Steelhide Mole
text: [x]Taunt, Reborn Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.

name: Snake Eyes
text: [x]Battlecry: Roll two dice, then Discover two cards of those Costs. (Doubles get an extra Discover!)

name: Battleworn Faceless
text: Battlecry: Transform into a copy of a damaged minion.

name: Antique Flinger
text: Battlecry: If you've Excavated twice, destroy an enemy minion.

name: Sludge on Wheels
text: [x]Rush. Whenever this takes damage, get a Barrel of Sludge and add one to the bottom of your deck.

name: Flint Firearm
text: [x]Battlecry: Get a random Quickdraw card. If you play it this turn, repeat this.

name: Blast Charge
text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion. Excavate a treasure.
